abstract: Both Curtis Granderson and Derek Jeter have Michigan ties, so why does Granderson get cheered at Detroit's Comerica Park and Jeter gets booed?
snippet: Both Curtis Granderson and Derek Jeter have Michigan ties, so why does Granderson get cheered at Detroit's Comerica Park and Jeter gets booed?
lead_paragraph: I noticed something interesting over the past two games at Comerica Park. There were two guys with Michigan ties playing in the Yankees' starting lineup, and only one of them got any love from Tigers fans.

headline.main: Detroit Still Loves Granderson, Boos Jeter
